131.title: Module 131 - Module 131: Indirect Questions (Could you tell me ...?)
131.description: B1 level intermediate grammar and vocabulary module
131.intro:
Module 131: Indirect Questions (Could you tell me ...?)
Grammar Explanation
Indirect questions are more polite and formal than direct questions. They often start with phrases like:
- Could you tell me...
- Do you know...
